name: PHI Breach Risk Assessment by HSO
description: Sends PHI risk assessment information to HSO (HIPAA Security Officer) for review and receives confirmation on whether the breach is reportable to relevant federal or law enforcement agencies.

resource.content: HSO assessment of PHI Breach Report is completed.

message.content: The PHI Breach Report has been sent to HSO for review.

arguments.operationTitle: Utils: Convert JSON into a HTML Table

step_variables.demoMode: {% if vars.result[0].dataCompliances[0].testMode %}Test Mode ON{% endif %}

steps.name: Mark HSO Review Status In Progress

message.content: HSO confirmed the breach as invalid. The incident can now be closed.

steps.name: Send Risk Assessment Details to HSO

schema.title: PHI Breach Report Approval

inputVariables.name: stepsTakenToInvestigateTheBreach
inputVariables.label: Please specify steps taken to investigate the breach
inputVariables.title: Text Area

inputVariables.name: actionsForApplyingTechnicalFix
inputVariables.label: Please advise on the actions needed to apply the technical fix
inputVariables.title: Text Area

inputVariables.name: measuresToReduceFutureRisks
inputVariables.label: Identify measures need to be taken to reduce or eliminate risks in future
inputVariables.title: Text Area

inputVariables.name: areTheAffectedIndividualsContactDetailsOutdated
inputVariables.label: Are the affected individuals contact details outdated?
inputVariables.title: Dynamic List

inputVariables.name: isSubstituteNoticeRequired
inputVariables.label: Is substitute notice required?
inputVariables.title: Dynamic List
inputVariables.tooltip: For under 10 outdated contacts, substitute notice can be given.

owner_detail.emailRecipients: {% if 'Test Mode ON' in vars.demoMode %}{{vars.demoEmail}}{% else %}{{vars.hsoEmail}}{% endif %}

message.content: Created Task #{{vars.steps.Task_to_Apply_Technical_Fix.id}} to apply technical fix or any other fix required to stop the incident.

resource.name: Perform Actions to Apply Technical Fix

steps.name: Task to Notify Breach to the Secretary

message.content: Created Task #{{vars.steps.Task_to_Notify_Breach_to_the_Secretary.id}} to notify the Secretary of HHS about PHI Breach.

resource.name: Notify Breach to the Secretary of HHS
resource.description: {{vars.demoMode}} ##### Notify Breach to the Secretary of HHS (Health and Human Services) ##### Click here to Submit a Breach Notification to the Secretary ##### Mark this Task **Completed** after notifying the secretary of the breach.

steps.name: Task to Report Law Enforcement Agency

message.content: Created Task #{{vars.steps.Task_to_Report_Law_Enforcement_Agency.id}} to report the PHI breach to the relevant criminal law enforcement agencies.

resource.name: Report Breach to Law Enforcement Agency

resource.description: {{vars.description | join('\n')}}{% for item in vars.taskList %} | {{loop.index+vars.currentIndex}} | {{(item | fromIRI).name}} | Click Here | ❌ |{% endfor %}

resource.isValidBreach: {% if 'Valid Breach' == vars.steps.Send_Risk_Assessment_Details_to_HSO.input.isValidBreach %}{{"YesNoInput" | picklist("Yes", "@id")}}{% else %}{{"YesNoInput" | picklist("No", "@id")}}{% endif %}

resource.description:
{{vars.demoMode}}

##### HSO confirmed the breach as invalid. The incident can now be closed.

routes.name: Add Comment for Valid Breach -> Task to Apply Technical Fix
Create Assessment Data Table -> Send Risk Assessment Details to HSO
Get Compliance Record ID -> Get Incident ID
Get Parent Incident ID -> Mark HSO Review Status In Progress
Get Parent Task -> Update Parent Task Status
Is Valid Breach -> Add Comment for Valid Breach
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Is Valid Breach -> Update Task Status in Incident
routes.label: No

routes.name: Mark HSO Review Status In Progress -> Create Assessment Data Table
Resolve Compliance Record -> Copy of Update Task Status
Send Risk Assessment Details to DPO -> Update GDPR Assessment Data
routes.label: Submit

routes.name: Task to Apply Technical Fix -> Task to Notify Breach to the Secretary
Task to Notify Breach to the Secretary -> Task to Report Law Enforcement Agency
Task to Report Law Enforcement Agency -> Mark Task as Completed
Update HIPAA Assessment Data -> Is Valid Breach
Update Task Description -> Get Parent Task
Update Task  Description -> Update Compliance Record Description
